summary: Users need a health check method on WorkflowClient or WorkflowServiceStubs to verify the underlying connection to the Temporal server is healthy. This was a common request across multiple SDKs.
userImpact: Users can now verify their connection to the Temporal server is healthy before executing workflows.
proposedFix: Expose health check method via WorkflowServiceStubs or WorkflowClient that wraps the gRPC health service.
workaround: Use raw gRPC client health service via connection.healthService.check()
resolutionDetails: Exposed via raw gRPC client through connection.healthService with HealthCheckResponse status
keyQuote: import { Connection } from '@temporalio/client'; const health = await connection.healthService.check({});
